# RecordSerializer&lt;TTargetType&gt;.DeserializeEnumerable method

Deserializes a file one record at a time suitable for usage in a foreach loop.

```csharp
public IEnumerable<TTargetType> DeserializeEnumerable(TextReader reader)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| reader | Reader which contains the CSV or FixedWidth data to deserialize. |

## Return Value

An enumerable collection of TargetType objects.
